game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in the ancient ruins.
game.description: You've received a map from an old friend pointing to a lost treasure. Your quest is to navigate through treacherous terrain, solve puzzles, and uncover the secret location to claim your reward.
game.reward: A legendary artifact and 1000 gold coins

task.description: You must reach the coordinates marked on the map where the ruins are believed to be located.

task.objective: Solve the riddle at the entrance
task.description: A cryptic riddle guards the entrance to the ruins. Decipher it to gain entry.
Beneath the ruins lies a labyrinth filled with traps and dangers. Find your way to the heart of it.
